FunctionOracle.name: func_std_grade
FunctionOracle.source: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION func_std_grade ( p_school_code VARCHAR2, p_class_code VARCHAR2, p_mark_obtained NUMBER, p_max_mark NUMBER ) RETURN VARCHAR2 AS v_grade VARCHAR2(10); BEGIN SELECT a.pseudo_name INTO v_grade FROM school_grade a WHERE a.status_name = 'ACTIVE' AND a.school_code = p_school_code AND a.class_code = p_class_code AND round(p_mark_obtained / p_max_mark * 100) BETWEEN a.range_from AND a.range_upto; RETURN v_grade; END;
